IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: Welcome to the Next.js Internationalization (i18n) example! This demo showcases the power of the App Router and how to manage multilingual content seamlessly using next-intl.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

Banner.title: Transform Your Voice into Action with AI
Banner.subtitle: Experience the future of communication with our AI voice app. Effortlessly interact, manage tasks, and control your world using just your voice.
